```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("dplyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("lubridate")
library("readxl")
library("writexl")

getwd()
DailySection<-read_excel("../Data/Processed/Sapwood/17Sapwood.xlsx")
```

```{r}
LA<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("LA"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:97), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

LB<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("LB"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:95), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

LC<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("LC"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:98), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

LO<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("LO"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:87), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

HA<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("HA"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:100), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

HB<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("HB"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:97), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

HC<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("HC"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:99), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

HO<-DailySection%>%
  select(1, contains("HO"))%>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2:86), names_to="ID", values_to="Sapwood")

```

```{r}
summary(LA$Sapwood)
summary(LB$Sapwood)
summary(LC$Sapwood)
```
